basics.outline: A cinematic journey through a rainy, neon-lit city at night. The protagonist walks alone, not in sadness but in supreme confidence.
basics.shooting_method: Slow tracking shots, shallow depth of field (bokeh city lights), smooth gimbal movements. Low key lighting with neon accents (cyan and magenta).
basics.art_style_description: Cinematic Realism, Wong Kar-wai inspired, moody, high contrast, wet pavement reflections, velvet textures.

prompts.first_frame: Cinematic shot, medium close-up, elegant woman sitting by a rain-streaked window...
prompts.last_frame: Woman standing up, silhouette against the city window...
